user_query: this violence like everyone else do you have any recollections of happy times yeah sure when my mom was in the kitchen and she loved to play them while she was okay and then my dad came home and the show stopped did you know anyone else a grandparent an aunt or uncle somebody that could show you some attention or affection yes Dr Tak affection he can get it and one evening over dinner my brother delightfully told my father he puts his food in his pockets to give to the dogs later no that's a lie swear cross my heart swear to I I love dogs huh we please not at the table more than you love your own family I do is your family oh my mother she did the only thing she could do you have to bury them father finds them he'll go crazy I don't remember exactly what she said just her face was red and wet and she apologized that was sweet she was pregnant yeah 7 months I guess she wanted to offer a child a better life did you ever try to run away where and one day by scratching at the wood I was able to squeeze my little window through which I could find how did you get out of that cage then what is it one of your informers ambulance and social services off the now that might have been the best day of my life by unfortunate coincidence the bullet hadn't ricocheted off the wall and launched itself in my spinal cord I was free at last but got to deprived me of legs to enjoy my freedom but the bullet was in a very delicate position right or wrong the doctors didn't want to risk taking it

entities.entity_description: Dr Tak은 화자가 언급한 인물로, 애정을 보여줄 수 있었던 사람으로 묘사된다
화자의 어머니는 부엌에서 음악을 틀며 요리하던 인물로, 임신 7개월 때 아이에게 더 나은 삶을 주고 싶어했으며, 화자를 보호하려 했던 인물이다
화자의 아버지는 폭력적인 인물로, 집에 오면 음악이 멈추고, 가족들이 두려워하는 존재로 묘사된다
화자의 형제는 저녁 식사 중 화자가 개에게 음식을 주려고 주머니에 넣는다고 아버지에게 고자질한 인물이다
화자는 학대받는 가정에서 자란 인물로, 작은 창문을 통해 탈출을 시도했으며, 총알이 척수에 박혀 다리를 잃게 된 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: 화자의 어머니는 화자를 보호하려 했으며 행복한 기억의 원천이었다
화자의 아버지는 화자를 학대하고 가두었던 인물이다
화자의 형제는 화자를 아버지에게 고자질한 관계이다
Dr Tak은 화자에게 애정을 보여줄 수 있었던 인물로 언급된다
화자의 어머니는 아버지를 두려워하며 그가 집에 오면 음악을 멈추었다
화자의 형제는 아버지에게 화자의 행동을 고자질했다
